summary: A populist right-wing tabloid newspaper tries to derail the official police investigation of a brutal murder of a young girl in order to help the fascist and right-wing candidates it supports in the upcoming elections.
cast: Gian Maria Volontè|Fabio Garriba|Carla Tatò|Jacques Herlin|John Steiner|Michel Bardinet|Jean Rougeul|Corrado Solari|Laura Betti|Enrico DiMarco|Silvia Kramar|Massimo Patrone|Gianni Solaro|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Marco Bellocchio|Gérard Boucaron|Gisella Burinato|Ignazio La Russa|Joris Muzio|Cirylle Spiga|Paola Tallarigo
title: Noticias de una violación en primera página
